name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in **Python**, **Django**, and cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **GCP**. Proficient in infrastructure as code tools like **Terraform**, containerization technologies including **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, and version control systems such as **Git** and **GitHub**. Adept at designing RESTful APIs and leveraging databases like **PostgreSQL** to create high-performance backend solutions. 

Skilled in Agile methodologies, particularly **Kanban**, I have a strong track record in building scalable microservices and event-driven systems. My expertise includes implementing CI/CD pipelines and ensuring adherence to compliance standards. I also bring valuable experience working collaboratively within cross-functional teams to deliver robust applications in fast-paced environments.
